definition: to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: Alcoholics Anonymous twelve-step program originated to help people overcome their addiction;
sentences.chinese: 匿名十二步戒酒法旨在幫助人們戒除酒癮。

sentences.english: Are you sure you quit, Harp?
And no association between accepting the label "alcoholic" and quitting drinking has been found.
sentences.chinese: 而且並未發現接受酗酒者的標籤與戒酒有任何聯繫。

sentences.english: We have encouraged Terrie to get alcohol counseling or attend A.
sentences.chinese: 我們鼓勵泰利去進行酒精諮詢或參加戒酒協會。

sentences.english: I plan to quit drinking, smoking and gambling so that I can make ends meet.
sentences.chinese: 我準備戒菸戒酒戒賭，以達到收支平衡。

sentences.english: Larsen sotted. The doctor proposed him to take yoga for abstinence.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾辛嗜酒如命，醫生建議他採取瑜伽法戒酒。

sentences.english: 12—Are you a strict t. t. ? says Joe.
sentences.chinese: “你是個嚴格的戒酒主義者嗎？”喬問。

sentences.english: That day, I quit drinking soft drink , and replaced it with water.
sentences.chinese: 那天，我戒酒軟飲料，而代之以水。

sentences.english: May I have a lemonade?I am on the wagon.
sentences.chinese: 我現在戒酒，給我一杯檸檬水好嗎？

sentences.english: Bin Laden's seeming temperance made his manifest bloody-mindedness all the harder to fathom.
sentences.chinese: 拉登的表現似乎讓他戒酒血腥的胸襟所有難以企及的。

sentences.english: Sometimes I thought they were checking up on my progress.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我覺得他們是在檢查我的戒酒狀況。

sentences.english: I couldn’t support my family while I was drinking, so I made the decision to sober up{.
sentences.chinese: 當我酗酒的時候，我連家都養不起，所以我決定戒酒。

sentences.english: LAN got a criticized such as sword, made up his mind to give up drinking.
sentences.chinese: 蘭如劍得了個通報批評，下定決心戒酒。

sentences.english: Maybe the Lockwoods should just stay away from booze?
sentences.chinese: 也許洛克伍德家族的人應該戒酒了吧？

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect and safety of the aversion therapy with furazolidone on patients with alcohol dependence.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察呋喃唑酮厭惡療法戒酒的療效和安全性。

sentences.english: The boss asked the drinker to dry out.
sentences.chinese: 老闆要求那個酒鬼戒酒。

definition: never to touch a drop of alcohol
to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess
to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
to resume smoking (after giving up)/to relapse into smoking or drug abuse
abstain from certain food (as when ill)/avoid certain foods/be on a diet
